text: Kepha ngingakwesaba kanjani lokho enanikwenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni (izithixo) kepha nibe ningakusabi lokho enanikwenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni, lokho angalehliselanga phansi kunina igunya ngakho ngakho-ke eliphi lamaqembu amabili elinelungelo lokuphepha uma nina ninolwazi na
